function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Covid-19 public health crisis impacting public space design","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to detect and mitigate disruptive events","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure of resilience strategies in response to large-scale events","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of preparedness for multi-hazard threats and incidents, including contagious diseases","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited understanding of engineering resilience may result in inadequate infrastructure for disease response","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of how a system fails","category":"Nature","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate resilience of infrastructure systems","category":"Infrastructure Systems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of preparedness for contagious diseases","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited resilience in infrastructure systems","category":"Infrastructure Systems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited research on resilience in the engineering domain may result in inadequate preparedness for engineering-related contagious disease outbreaks.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of domain-specific representation in quantitative resilience approaches may result in overlooking unique factors relevant to contagious disease propagation in different environments.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of system drivers and disturbances","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate buffer capacity for change in the system","category":"Nature","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of quantification of system resilience","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability to mass transportation system attacks","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in achieving resilience in medication delivery","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of reporting system","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The process industry may be vulnerable to contagious diseases due to the high density of workers and the potential for disease spread within the built environment.","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unrealistic assumption of 100% quality of community infrastructure before earthquake","category":"Infrastructure Systems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumed instantaneous impact of disruptive events","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in estimating expected degraded performance level for unknown disruptions.","category":"Infrastructure Systems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to quantify resilience value within a range of 0 and 1 for dynamic resilience.","category":"Infrastructure Systems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complexity of the time-dependent resilience metric equation","category":"Infrastructure Systems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of specificity in accounting for recovery time in the formulation of resilience metrics","category":"Infrastructure Systems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resilience metric that does not consider time to recover, leading to inaccurate assessment","category":"Infrastructure Systems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate safety indicator measurement for public transportation systems’ resilience assessment","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of mathematical equations without proper context","category":"Infrastructure Systems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of clarity in defining speed of recovery and performance levels","category":"Infrastructure Systems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to account for environmental and human factors in resilience calculations","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty comprehending extreme values of the metric","category":"Infrastructure Systems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Exponential growth function may not always represent system behavior","category":"Infrastructure Systems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Quality of service as a measure of resilience","category":"Infrastructure Systems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in quantification of resilience","category":"Infrastructure Systems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to consider extra penalty for performance loss and recovery time exceeding maximum acceptable values.","category":"Infrastructure Systems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incorporation of multiple hazards into the resilience measurement approach.","category":"Infrastructure Systems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mischaracterization of restoration and resilience due to errors in estimating conditional probability by expert knowledge.","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resilience formula considers both pre-disaster and post-disaster activities, leading to a more suitable measurement for engineering systems.","category":"Infrastructure Systems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in calculating conditional probability, especially when a disruption occurs for the first time.","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The resilience metric described in the text may not directly address the specific challenges posed by contagious diseases and their propagation in the built environment.","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stochastic nature of pd","category":"Undefined","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Dependence on Systems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate identification of primary contributors to network resilience","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Modeling vulnerability and recoverability in a network","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Structural-based models for system resilience","category":"Infrastructure Systems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of pre-event mitigation strategies for road networks","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficiency in petrochemical plant account for cascading impact of disruptive events through waterway network","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"High"}]}
